input.prompt:
Fix the code for Phase 10: Keyboard Accessibility and Focus States

GOAL:  Ensure proper keyboard navigation and visible focus indicators.

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Tab key navigates through input, Add button, checkboxes, and delete buttons
- All focused elements show visible focus indicator with #2563eb color
- Enter/Space activates focused buttons and checkboxes
- Focus order follows visual layout (top to bottom, left to right)
- No focus traps exist
- Screen reader can identify interactive elements (proper labels/roles)

REVIEWER FEEDBACK:
To pass the "Screen reader can identify interactive elements (proper labels/roles)" criterion, you should add appropriate ARIA roles and labels to all interactive elements. For example:

- Ensure that checkboxes have `role="checkbox"` and an appropriate `aria-checked` state.
- Ensure that buttons have `role="button"`.
- Consider using `<label>` elements for checkboxes to improve accessibility.
